name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control: Disable new ads API

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable new ads API: Attribution Reporting, Private Aggregation API, Protected Audience API (Fledge API), Private State Tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
